reviews.title: Poor customer service
reviews.text: I had a mortgage with the nanchester, but when I ran into financial diffukcuties they did not want to know. They were not helpful and they just wanted to reprocess my house without any payment plan. Even though I was in the process of selling a second property they just kept applying charges ... My second property was sold and I was able to settle my mortgage with the Manchester I now have a mortgage with another company and things are just great do not give your business to the Manchester

reviews.title: Solid staff that want to help you
reviews.text: My local branch in Manchester has the best bank staff I've seen. Would recommend them.

reviews.title: Savings Team - Manchester BS excelled ..
reviews.text: Manchester BS excelled in service, through a postal application to a branch only based regular saver. I'm hearing and mobility impaired and can't get to one under my own steam.  Many thanks to the team, but particularly to Mohammed: he kindly pre-populated the application form. Customer service is an area where local mutuals can really make a difference, especially when compared to the industry giants.

reviews.title: Excellent service and customer care
reviews.text: Opened an account today with Mohammed and the service was absolutely outstanding from start to finished.  I have only just moved to Manchester so it was tricky to sort out my ID but we got there in the end.  Mohammed was helpful and courteous from the start and I would recommend them wholeheartedly.

reviews.title: Interesting website providing more…
reviews.text: Interesting website providing more glitz than practicality and limited userfriendlyness. Instant access account has appalling interest rate so it seems they are not interested in ordinary people who want to put just a few pounds away. Have put funds elsewhere at more than double the interest rate and instant access
